summary: After an artist is threatened by the yakuza into creating valuable but highly illegal pornography, the law aims to execute him. Zatoichi, having been honor bound to protect the man and his family, must now run against the law.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Jûshirô Konoe|Miwa Takada|Yukiji Asaoka|Mikiko Tsubouchi|Mie Nakao|Takao Ito|Asao Koike|Midori Isomura|Tatsuo Matsumura|Eitarô Ozawa|Jôtarô Senba|Kôjirô Kusanagi|Kenzô Tabu|Osami Nabe|Akihisa Toda|Kôji Fujiyama|Kôichi Mizuhara|Shôsaku Sugiyama|Ikuko Môri
title: Zatôichi chikemuri kaidô
